Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of T3-šd-ḫnsw with black painted detail: a lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face with traced eyes and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
